thread.title: Bruno Mars Dances Up A Literal Storm In His Music Video For That’s What I Like! WATCH!
thread.title_full: Bruno Mars Dances Up A Literal Storm In His Music Video For That’s What I Like! WATCH!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Bruno Mars Dances Up A Literal Storm In His Music Video For That’s What I Like! WATCH!
text:
3/01/2017 9:20 PM ET | Filed under: Music Minute • Bruno Mars • Dance 
Who needs backup dancers?? Bruno Mars can do choreography all by himself! 
On Wednesday, the soulful singer released the music video for his latest single That's What I Like where he gets his groove on amidst a back drop of illustrations. 
Unlike his previous videos, this one is (relatively) stripped down and minimalist. 
Ch-ch-check out the new video (above)! Selena Gomez & The Weeknd: A Timeline Of Their Relationship!
